sentence.Network_en: He was fifty or there abouts and was corpulent and tall in person.
sentence.Network_cn: 他大约50岁,身体肥胖高大.

sentence.Network_en: We found a corpulent corpse and a letter of correspondence.
sentence.Network_cn: 发现里面有一具臃肿的尸体和一封联系信件.

sentence.Network_en: Next nosepiece are corpulent. What drug can you take?

list.abs: This was a corpulent farmer ., 这是个大块头的农夫.
he a large and corpulent individual , surfeited with good clothes and good eating , who judged women as another would horseflesh .他是个高大而肥胖的人，穿得好，吃得好，鉴别女人就像别人鉴别马匹一样。
when treating corpulent sex spondylitis , be in beanbag ligature pain spot place .治疗肥大性脊椎炎时,将小布袋缚在痛点处。
肥疳 fat gan1肥贵人 corpulent person肥热疳 fat heat gan1

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin corpulentus, from corpus 'body'

entry.def: If you describe someone as corpulent, you mean they are fat.

auth_sentence.content: This fellow, who was corpulent, to say the least, had a little boyfriend named Johnny.
auth_sentence.res_content: This fellow, who was corpulent, to say the least, had a little boyfriend named Johnny.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This fellow, who was corpulent, to say the least, had a little boyfriend named Johnny.

auth_sentence.content: "It was back when I was wandering around the Congo," he was saying, and his large, somewhat corpulent figure swayed slightly.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: "It was back when I was wandering around the Congo," he was saying, and his large, somewhat corpulent figure swayed slightly.

auth_sentence.content: Budberg is corpulent and sly, and he wears a small beard and small glasses.

stems_affixes.word_buile: corp身体,团体+ulent多……的→多身体的→肥胖的
corp身体,团体+s复数→n.军队,团体
corp身体,团体+uscle小东西→小球体→血球
